4J Studios：There's a small bug fix rolling out now for MinecraftPS3 to fix an issue preventing access to the Glide Myths Track Pack.
4J Studios：现在PS3平台已经发布一个小的bug修复的更新，修复了不能使用滑翔神话追踪包的问题。
